reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Great lecturer, explains concepts clearly. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable and approachable. Makes difficult topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures but a bit disorganized. Lab sessions are helpful.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Lectures are monotonous, and the exams are much harder than the practice problems.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Engaging discussions and insightful feedback on essays. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable but a bit dry in lectures. Exams are straightforward.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and encourages deep thinking. Exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Lectures are informative but often go off on tangents. Assignments are difficult.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Very engaging and makes the material relatable. A lot of reading required.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Not very helpful during office hours. Lectures are hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Brilliant lecturer with a deep understanding of the material. Highly recommend her courses.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Lectures are okay but a bit dry. Exams are tricky.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Enthusiastic about the subject and provides great insights. However, exams are a bit challenging.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Great professor, though the workload is heavy. Very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Amazing teacher with a real passion for music. Class is both fun and educational.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but the lectures can be a bit boring. Lots of reading.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Well-structured lectures and approachable. Field trips are a great addition.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. Encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and practical assignments. A lot of group work.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Lectures are tough to follow, and the professor is not very responsive to emails.
